2-1 Stages of the project

2-1.2 Design of the TECFAMOO

Following this study we have built up our own environment in order to offer a testbed adapted to the VMDL project's purposes: we then offered a virtual meeting place within the TECFAMOO called the Educational Technologies Center for European communities of researchers associated to this research domain. We designed both a virtual building on the TECFAMOO and related WWW pages with maps and standard WWW hypertext links to papers and bibliographies from the library virtual room.

VMDL/MOO Report - 17 FEB 1996
